name: Olaoluwa Oluro
bio: I love Ruby because of it's developer friendliness over everything and the speed of which you can just get going with tasks.

name: Olia Kremmyda
bio: I'm a developer for 4 years and the last year I have been working with Ruby. Exercism is a great help to get over the C and C++ habits and move to the Ruby way of thinking. Likewise, it makes me so happy to be able to give back to this community as a mentor!

name: Oren Kanner
bio: I'm a lapsed mechanical engineer and robotocist turned software developer, deeply in love with Ruby (although Elixir is pretty great too). Currently the Application Development Manager @ Yale University.
